item.title: Getting Started with LLMs and RAG
item.author: cairo.nlp.group@gmail.com (cAIro|NLP Group)
item.description: Talk Details Speaker: Hassan Ayman, Microsoft Date: October 2, 2024 Time: 9:00 PM Cairo Time Format: Online via Zoom Abstract Large Language Models (LLMs) have revolutionized natural language processing, but they face challenges with hallucination and outdated knowledge. This introductory talk explores Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) as a solution that combines the reasoning capabilities of LLMs with real-time information retrieval from external knowledge sources. Perfect for beginners wanting to understand the RAG paradigm and experienced developers looking to implement their first RAG application.
